content.rendered:
Additional Units Baggage:

  •  Additional Baggage is limited to the piece up to a maximum of 23 Kg each. The number of pieces of extra baggage can be limited depending on the type of aircraft and the load offered.
  • Any additional baggage, granted by the Company as a favor or free of charge to a passenger, shall be the subject of a free luggage separate from its normal deductible

For more details visit : https://www.air madagascar.com.lb/english/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Air Madagascar Hand | Cabin Baggage

Air Madagascar Checked Baggage
